Name: Devochka Quest
About the game: This game is more than adventure, is the game drew up on paper using watercolours, which includes the game detail and even the animations! This is a story about a little girl who is preparing to celebrate the New Year. She will meet the fabulous animals and wonders. - There is no words :) - There is no speech :) - Everything is clear without words ^.^ - The Girl have no face (you can imagine any) - The Game is not so long... and... - Unique colorful style - Hand drawn watercolor graphic - Music played on live musical instruments (inc Balalaika, Garmoshka, Glockenspiel) - Joyful ambience of childhood - Good jokes - Cats...
